intro: Claytosmunda, commonly known as the narrowleaf water fern, is a species of aquatic fern belonging to the family Onocleaceae. Claytosmunda plays a vital role in aquatic ecosystems by providing habitat for small aquatic organisms and contributing to water filtration.
